name: I Must Survive
description:
A journey of man who must escape from North Korea.

Find some items on the road.

Give the items to the broker.

Then the man will be free!!

You can see video on YouTube!

**This video contains Ending**


Team :  Disappearing People

Director : Kim Hyunjin (김현진)

Programmer : Yoon Li Nam (윤이남)

Art Director : Kim Yoon Jung(김윤정)

Graphic : Cho Hyi Jin (조희진)

Sound : Kim Yeon Hu (김연후)

Nothing Man : Gwon Oh Heum (권오흠)
